provisions.title: Section 1
provisions.content: 1. This Act may be cited as the Venereal Disease Act.                     Short title.

        (2) The Minister, whether he is satisfied that proper
provision has .been made in any parish, or any part thereof,
for the treatment of persons residing therein for venereal di-
sease, may from time to time by order published in the Gazette
declare any parish, or part thereof, to be a declared district
within the meaning of this section, and thereupon such parish, or
part thereof, shall be deemed to be a declared district within the
meaning of this section until the order declaring the same to be
such a district shall be revoked.
